DOC.brief_summary: Profiling microRNAs long noncoding RNAs ( lncRNAs ) patient undergo cardiac surgery . Analysis : Prediction acute kidney injury plasma expression profile microRNAs ?
DOC.detailed_description: In pilot study include 150 patient undergoing cardiac surgery German university hospital . We profile microRNA expression plasma urine several timepoints surgery . We use preselected panel microRNAs lncRNAs analysis . Goal identify microRNAs/lncRNAs able predict occurence AKI patient .
DOC.criteria: cardiac surgery preexist chronic kidney injury inclusion another study pregnancy Kidney transplantation history GFR < 30 ml/min ( glomerular filtration rate ) ECLS therapy ( extracorporal life support )
